summary: This bill, the "Studying NEPA's Impact on Projects Act," mandates that the Council on Environmental Quality (CEQ) publish an annual report. This report will detail causes of action related to alleged non-compliance with the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) of 1969, including court outcomes and the status of environmental reviews. The report will also analyze the length and cost of environmental impact statements and assessments, as well as timelines for completing reviews. Data will be disaggregated by project type and covered sector, and the underlying data will be made publicly available.
